actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the relocation expenses of employees transferred or reemployed.

summary.text: Provides that for purposes of the provision authorizing the payment of a transferred Federal employee's expenses for the sale of an old residence and purchase of a new home, the old and new official duty stations of the employee shall be determined without regard to one or more intervening posts of duty in a combat zone if the employee volunteers to serve at such intervening posts and if his aggregate service at such intervening posts does not exceed eighteen months. ((Amends 50 U.S.C. 5724a(a)(4))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the relocation expenses of employees transferred or reemployed.
